document.full_text: quickening climate change in the arctic including a thaw of greenland's ice could raise world sea levels by up to 1.6 meters by 2100, an international report showed on tuesday.
document.title: seas could rise up to 1.6 meters by 2100: study
lines_and_colors: quickening climate change in the arctic including a thaw of greenland's ice could raise world sea levels by up to 1.6 meters by 2100, an international report showed on tuesday.
